trends: There has been one other sighting in Sabattus
There were no other sightings in Sabattus on or around October 1st 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsIt appeared to have come out from the direction of the full moon, which was tomy left.it went off in a very rapid parallel direction, and the comet-like trailor vapors which followed it were no more. It hovered minus the trail(s) and thenappeared more round. The orb was incandescent green with a vibrantly bright redhalo surrounding it. It absolutely was not of this planet.i lost sight of itafter about 4 minutes. basically i was calm during the event but scared shitlessafter. at first it looked like a comet but then when i saw it was moving toofast to be a comet i thought it was a ufo. i was listening to my cd player withmy dog sitting with me outside when my cd player stopped working and my dogstarted wimpering. then i heard a humming sound. when i looked to the north westi saw it. it left my sight when it was going in the south east,
Summary: saw a green orb coming from the north west
